welcome_details.title: WELCOME TO THE TEAM!
welcome_details.description: Trophies are the best, aren’t they? Let’s win another one, together. Your participation in this app will give us competitive advantages in all the ways that help us win: developing our style of play, building our roster, and preparing game plans. YOU can be the difference.
welcome_details.author: - Denis Bouanga, #99

team_home.motto: DALE! DALE! DALE! BLACK AND GOLD!!

missions.title: LEAGUES CUP: PENALTIES
missions.description: Leagues Cup starts in 1 month. If penalty kicks come into play, we want to have an informational advantage. By answering the following questions, you'll help us better understand the tendencies of oopponent kick-takers. The difference between advancing and going home can be just a fingertip. Let's get ready!
missions.completion_msg: Thanks for generating this data -- we'll use it to predict where opponents will direct their penalties. Leagues Cup is coming up, let's win another trophy!

missions.title: SATURDAY NIGHT: COLUMBUS CREW
missions.description: The Columbus Crew visit BMO Stadium on Saturday, and we are in game-planning mode. Help us study their tendencies on set-pieces so we can design plays to take advantage. Let's get a set-piece goal this weekend!
missions.completion_msg: Thanks, your work will help us identify weaknesses to exploit in our opponent's defense. This kind of intel can lead to goals. Let's get one Saturday!

questions.question: How many defenders are in the wall?

Which of the defenders is not looking at the ball when it is kicked (they are focused on their man)?
On the left image, draw a line where the wall is set up.  Then click NEXT.

missions.title: LAFC ACADEMY
missions.description: Our LAFC Academy is the future of our club. Help us track the development of our young players. One day, you'll be serenading them at BMO Stadium.
missions.completion_msg: Thanks for generating this information, it helps us develop the future of our club.

menu_list.select_description: Help evaluate players for our roster.
menu_list.submit_description: If you think something can help us, submit it here.

review_idea.title: PLAYBOOK | OFFENSE
review_idea.description: These innovative plays were discovered by your fellow LAFC fans. By describing and rating the plays, you’ll help surface the best ones for our coaching staff to consider for our playbook.
review_idea.completion_msg: Thanks for developing our playbook. This helps us have the right play for the right moment. I'm going to get my head on one of these!

select_idea.title: TEAM BUILDING
select_idea.description: Evaluating players for our roster never ends, we are constantly scanning the globe. You can give us another set of eyes to help us make decisions. Take a look at the following sets of players and tell us who you think would be best for our team in terms of fit and impact.
select_idea.completion_msg: We value your intel and we'll use it to make the best decisions as we build our team during the transfer window. Thanks for your insight!

questions.question: Choose the U-23 Center Forward playing in Brazil's Série A that fits our roster best. Add attributes that match our needs.
Choose the U-23 Left Winger playing in Brazil's Série A that fits our roster best. Add attributes that match our needs.
Choose the U-23 Right Winger playing in Brazil's Série A that fits our roster best. Add attributes that match our needs.
These European stars are 33 years old and may come to the MLS in the future. Which one would fit our team the best?
Which of these U-23 backup MLS goalkeepers has the most potential?
Which of these over-35 stars would you most like to see on our team?

Choose the U-21 Attacking Midfielder playing in the Primera Division of Argentina that fits our roster best.
Which of these goalkeepers playing for USL teams has the most potential?

submit_idea.title: SUBMIT AN IDEA
submit_idea.description: Share your expertise here: Find an innovative set-piece from an international team to enhance our playbook. Scout an upcoming oppponent to exploit a weakness. Analyze our salary cap to optimize our roster. Whatever you know that can help, we want to hear it!
